App Name: AnswersAi

Brief: AnswersAi Mobile is an innovative educational assistant designed to help students navigate through challenging school tasks and projects across a wide array of disciplines. With its intuitive AI-driven functionalities such as the Snap & Solve feature, the app offers instantaneous problem-solving capabilities, taking your learning experience to the next level.
